1201360.name: Assetto Corsa Competizione - Intercontinental GT Pack
1201360.description:
The Intercontinental GT Pack DLC introduces 4 iconic international circuits in Assetto Corsa Competizione, from four different continents:

- Kyalami Grand Prix Circuit (South Africa)
- Suzuka Circuit (Japan)
- Weathertech ®️ Raceway Laguna Seca (USA)
- Mount Panorama Circuit (Australia)



These tracks extend the GT Series to the Intercontinental GT Challenge, providing an unforgivable and challenging driving experience thanks to their exclusive layout finely reproduced using Laserscan®️ technology, allowing for an extreme precision in detail.

The DLC also features more than 45 new car liveries, 30 new teams and 50 new drivers in addition to new game modes, all from the real-life Intercontinental GT Challenge powered by Pirelli. Get it now to enjoy even more the depth of the most popular GT racing simulation available on Steam!
1201360.supported_languages:
英语*, 意大利语, 法语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 简体中文, 繁体中文, 韩语, 日语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 俄语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
